title: Council Decision of 8 December 1995 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 8 December 1995 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (95/C 343/03)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 80/156/EEC of 21 January 1980 setting up an Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, by its Decision of 23 October 1995 (2), the Council appointed Ms Ulla-Britt CARMNES, a member of the Committee for the period ending 22 October 1998;
Whereas the Swedish Government has nominated Ms Britt-Marie TERNESTEDT to replace Ms Ulla-Britt CARMNES,
main_body: Ms Britt-Marie TERNESTEDT is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives in place of Ms Ulla-Britt CARMNES for the remainder of her term of office, which ends on 22 October 1998.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 December 1995.
For the Council
The President
J. BORRELL FONTELLES
(1) OJ No L 33, 11. 2. 1980, p. 13.
(2) OJ No C 292, 7. 11. 1995, p. 2.
